title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Activity-Based Teaching Method Design and Application in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core principles (e.g., interactivity, contextualization, feedback system) for designing activity-based pedagogy in digital environments.
Learners can apply a step-by-step process to design discussion and collaborative assignments in LMS-based social science courses.
Learners can develop two or more formative assessment strategies using technological tools (e.g., LMS discussion boards, digital collaboration platforms).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
